text:
Hi guys and girls, <@UFBDBKQ1H> I have the same question. I will describe my scenario:
We are B2B company <http://shore.com|shore.com>. In <http://my.shore.com|my.shore.com> we integrated HubSpot chat, that merchants can contact to our help centre. We want to have the same in our iOS native app. How is it possible to do that? Thanks in advance :slightly_smiling_face:
